entities.name: bathilda bagshot
entities.description: Bathilda Bagshot is mentioned as an incredible magic historian who wrote 'A History of Magic'. She is still alive and lives in Godric's Hollow. Harry wants to talk to her about Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone whose family Bathilda Bagshot knew. Harry wants to talk to Bathilda about him.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is mentioned as the place where Bathilda Bagshot lives.

relationships.description: Harry wants to talk to Bathilda about Dumbledore.
